channel.title: First Post on Girish Luckhun
channel.description: Recent content in First Post on Girish Luckhun

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Now I know what you’re thinking… This blog post isn’t very impressive looking. Well, I’m still quite proud of it! This is my first blog post using Hugo, a static website generator. The thing you have to know about me, however, is that I really enjoy customization. Some might (rightfully) call me a hipster in certain situations. I’m very excited to see what I will be able to achieve with this blog!
